content: protest is patriotic shawlette by craftivist elizabeth sovern knit one change too yarn weight fingering yardage madelinetosh light in blood runs cold red= 252 yards and arctic blue = 44 yards malabrigo mechita in 063 natural white= 272 yards needles size 5 needles or size to get gauge gauge 6 stitches and 10 row to 1 inch directions blue section cast on 2 stitches in blue row 1 rs kfb knit 1= 3 stitches row2 ws kfb kfb knit 1 = 5 stitches row 3 rs kfb knit to last 2 stitches k2 decrease row 4 ws knit to last 2 stitches kfb knit 1 place a locking marker on the right side row to help you remember which is the right side row a safety pin will work if you don t have removable locking markers repeat row 3 and 4 thirteen more times through row 30= 19 stitches star pattern continue with increase and decrease pattern above carry the white yarn along with back with the blue and up the sides for every 5th row i give stitch count below just to help you keep track but it doesn t matter that much you will knit star pattern until you ve knit 50 stars if you want more than 50 just keep on star row 1 rs kfb knit 3 stitches blue and 1 white k 5 blue 1 white continue pattern until last 2 stitches k2tog star row 2 ws - k1 purl to last 2 stitches purling the white and blue stitches as they come up kfb knit 1 = 3 stars this row row 3 in blue only rs kfb knit to last 2 stitches k2 decrease row 4 in blue only ws knit to last 2 stitches kfb knit 1 repeat row 3 and 4 twice 22 stitches 1 row 7 rs kfb k i white 5 blue k1 white 5 blue k1 white 5 blue k1 white k2 decrease blue- 22 stitches row 8 ws knit 1 blue purl 1 white purl rest of the row purlng the blue and the white stitches as they present themselves until last 2 stitches kfb k1 =23 stitches= 4 stars this row repeat row 3 and 4 of star pattern 2 times 25 stitches row 13 rs kfb k3 blue k1 white k5 blue continue color pattern until last 2 stitches k2 decrease row 14 ws knit 1 stitch purl until last 2 stitches purling the blue and white stitches as they come up kfb knit one=26 stitches- 4 stars this row repeat row 3 and 4 twice 28 stitches row 19-kfb k1 blue k1 white k5 blue repeat 4 times k2 decrease row 20 ws k1 blue purl rest of row purling the blue and white stitches as they present themselves until last 2 stitches kfb k1 4 stars this row repeat row 3 and 4 twice with blue yarn row 25 rs kfb knit 4 blue k1 white k 5 blue to last 2
